summary.span: 針對按下 、 或 控制項時顯示 的控制項提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a when a , , or control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象的基底類別，如， ，和，它可以裝載項目直接或主機的下拉式清單的容器中的其他項目。 is the abstract base class for , , and , which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container. 您可以設定屬性和設定屬性。You do this by setting the property to a and setting the property of the . 存取這些下拉式清單項目直接透過屬性。Access these drop-down items directly through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示和隱藏控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to show and hide controls. MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有聯，呼叫建立泛型的下拉式清單控制項。If no is associated with the , a call to creates a generic drop-down control. > [!NOTE] > 如果下拉式清單控制項自動產生，這表示，項目加入至集合中，然後您將明確的下拉式清單控制項的屬性，您可能會遺失資料。If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指派控制權傳輸至控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to assign a control to a control's property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripDropDownItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripDropDownItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Raised in response to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef m As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % m, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: m
param.span: 由參考所傳遞的 ，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 處理命令按鍵。

span.span: Processes a command key.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是在處理命令的索引鍵前置處理的訊息。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令索引鍵是一律優先於一般輸入索引鍵的索引鍵。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器及功能表快速鍵。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不命令按鍵。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 實作這個方法會呼叫的中的項目是否集合。The implementation of this method calls the of the if there are items in the collection. 否則，此實作會呼叫基底類別實作。Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.

permission.span: 直接呼叫端和繼承的類別呼叫這個方法。

span.span: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: .

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中的，應傳回的方法覆寫以表示它具有處理金鑰。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the method override should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 在衍生的類別很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

protected public: override bool ProcessDialogKey(System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: keyData
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

span.span: Processes a dialog key.

returns.span: 如果按鍵已由此項目處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理向上、 向下、 左、 右、 ENTER 和空格鍵的索引鍵，才能瀏覽下拉式功能表階層的訊息前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.

permission.span: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中的覆寫的實作應該傳回以表示它具有處理金鑰。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 在衍生的類別很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

summary.span: 顯示與這個 關聯的 控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以顯示已設定的下拉式清單控制項屬性。Use the method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何顯示控制當按下按鈕時。The following code example demonstrates how to show a control when a button is pressed. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
